summary: TypeScript compiler error in deprecated-time.ts due to unfamiliar syntax that requires TypeScript 5.1 or later to properly recognize.
userImpact: Users with TypeScript versions below 5.1 may encounter compiler errors when building the SDK.
rootCause: The syntax in deprecated-time.ts is not recognized by TypeScript versions below 5.1.
proposedFix: Upgrade to TypeScript 5.1 or later to recognize the syntax.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved by supporting TypeScript 5.1 which properly recognizes the syntax.
keyQuote: Using typescript > 5.1 helps to recognise this syntax.
